Package io.nirahtech.entities.artifacts

Class SuperObject

java.lang.Object
io.nirahtech.entities.artifacts.SuperObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
GeoLocalizable, GameProcess
Direct Known Subclasses:
Key
public abstract class SuperObject extends Object implements GameProcess, GeoLocalizable
Class that represents an object inside the game environment.
